rekit.logic.gameelements.entities.enemies.cannon

Class CannonStateMachine

  • java.lang.Object
    • rekit.util.state.TimeStateMachine
      • rekit.logic.gameelements.entities.enemies.cannon.CannonStateMachine

  • public class CannonStateMachine
extends TimeStateMachine

    Extension of TimeStateMachine that is specifically used for Cannons.

    Different from the regular TimeStateMachine as it saves the reference to a Cannon supplied in the constructor and only accepts and returns specialized CannonStates.
    Author:
    Angelo Aracri

    • Method Detail

      • nextState

        public void nextState()
        Description copied from class: TimeStateMachine

        Switches the State to the next as specified by State.getNextState().

        Calls both the old States State.leave() as well as the new ones State.enter(TimeStateMachine parent).

        Overrides:
        nextState in class TimeStateMachine
